alert.note: Alert for Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Grant and southeastern Hidalgo Counties through 945 AM MDT... At 900 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Alamo Hueco, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Playas Valley, Hachita Valley, and Big Hatchet Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
